timeline.bodyText:
What if a user sets an account id (non-default), but not subnets?  Setting default subnets will be incorrect.
I think we should validate/set this data together, as they must be mutually consistent.
timeline.author: tbak

timeline.message: Combine accountId and subnets validations and sanitize with defaults when applicable

timeline.bodyText: If I understand it correctly, setting accontId parameter to the default account id is non-compliant?
timeline.author: tbak

replies.bodyText:
Non compliant if:
(1). default account_id and subnets are set in the configuration (expected for the stack),
AND
(2a). account_id and subnets are empty in the job descriptor, OR
(2b). account_id is set to the default account_id but subnets is not set in the job descriptor
All other cases are given a pass under current/default behavior.
replies.author: joshi-keyur
